content:
I've booked a reservation for 7 pm tonight at Carmine's Theater District location. You should receive a confirmation email shortly.

Regarding transportation from JFK to Midtown Manhattan, I'd recommend taking a ride-hail service like Uber or Lyft. It's generally more convenient and easier to navigate than hailing a yellow cab, especially if you're not familiar with the city. Plus, you can track your ride and get an estimate of the fare beforehand.

I've already taken care of my transportation from JFK, but thanks for the advice! I actually took a United Airlines flight from San Francisco to New York today, and I'm still getting settled in. Now, I'm looking forward to a delicious dinner at Carmine's.

Do you have any other recommendations for things to do or see in Midtown Manhattan, or should I just take it easy tonight after my long flight?
